thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com
thread.title: Rosemary Dahri
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Rosemary Dahri

author: Rosemary Dahri
title: Rosemary Dahri
text:
I had a problem with my washer not draining properly. The Tech was very professional
He was able to figure out the problem but since we could not locate the serial # of the washer he was unable to get the part to make the repair. I will have to purchase a new washer and they are giving me 35% of the cost to replace the washer.
